item.title: Python Conditionals
item.description: Python Conditional Statements Greetings programming enthusiasts. Today we are gonna give you a deep dive about python if else statements. Before learning about pythons if else statements, you have to be familiar with the usual logical conditions. Python Logical Conditions == equal operator. example: a = 5 b = 5 print(a == b) #returns true c = 6 d = 9 print(c == d) #returns false > greater than operator < less than operator example:
